channel.title: CVE Feed for SecondLineThemes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SecondLineThemes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5308|2023-10-20T06:35:09.756Z -- secondlinethemes -- podcast%20subscribe%20buttons
item.description: The Podcast Subscribe Buttons plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'podcast_subscribe' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 1.4.8 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2023-23797|2023-05-22T10:00:57.959Z -- secondlinethemes -- auto%20youtube%20importer
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in SecondLineThemes Auto YouTube Importer plugin <=Â 1.0.3 versions.
